opening_scene.description: You find yourself in a quiet clearing in the Whispercross forest. Ancient trees tower above you, their branches creating a natural canopy that filters the sunlight into soft, dappled patterns on the forest floor. The air is filled with the gentle sounds of nature - rustling leaves, distant bird calls, and the soft murmur of a nearby stream.
opening_scene.atmosphere: Peaceful and mystical, with an underlying sense of ancient magic

introduction.text: Welcome to Whispercross, a realm where the boundaries between the natural and supernatural blur. Here, ancient magic flows through the very air, and every path leads to new discoveries.

initial_choices.label: Explore the clearing carefully
initial_choices.description: Take time to observe your surroundings and understand where you are

initial_choices.label: Follow one of the forest paths
initial_choices.description: Choose a path and see where it leads

initial_choices.label: Rest and meditate
initial_choices.description: Take a moment to center yourself and connect with the forest's energy
